name: Data Access Layer (DAL)
short_description: Data Access Layer (DAL) is an abstraction layer for application to communicate with DBMS, with DAL you don't consider about connection,dataadapter,...just make new DAL instance and execute query. It's independence with DBMS!DAL support Param,Transaction
